name: 9pm_testing
description:
This project was made for a one-week game jam, but I'm planning on expanding upon it!

It's 9pm and you're trapped in the lab you work at - together with a bunch of zombies! Which is... y'know, less than ideal. 

What will you do?

💀 Be careful - your choices will affect the fate of your fellow heroes!

Features in this version:
  • 2 playable characters
  • 14 Endings
  • Badge collecting
  • Choices that affect the next character playthrough
Planned features:
  • 4 playable characters
  • 30 Endings
  • X Secret Endings
  • Badge collecting
  • Choices that affect the next character playthrough
